item.description:
This is a joint-Meetup with the East/West of the River Dining Out group - Please RSVP on only one of the groups.  Because we haven't gone there in a while and it is so very good I decided to invite the Ethnic Dining Group also. Let's make this a great big party!

Havelis developed in India in ancient times as royal houses where Royal guests would stay and be entertained. Laxman Sharma (owner/chef) has continued this tradition of serving the King and Queen at Haveli India in Middletown Connecticut. As, Laxman states : his new King and Queen are the guests, who come to Haveli India to be dined and pampered by his always polite and attentive staff. Here you will find food fit for a King or a Queen.

Anyone who has dined here can attest to the wonderfully tasteful and aromatic dishes...all served at your request. From the time you are seated, you will be spoiled by the superb foods and impeccable service. You will be seated in an atmosphere of serenity and will mingle with friends, enjoying this unique dining experience and great conversation.

Terri is the Organizer and she will collect $2.00 from each attendee for the costs of running her groups.  All "YES" RSVP's must attend (unless you chane your RSVP by 2:00pm the previous day.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: HAVELI INDIA Thursday 6/23/11 6:30
